title: God's Got Your Back
description:
Don’t let what you’re walking into distract you from the fact that God is walking with you.

In “God’s Got Your Back,” Pastor Steven teaches us that our faith shouldn’t lie in what’s ahead, but in who is backing us.

If you’ve just made a decision for Christ, please respond HERE: http://ele.vc/tIepfr

To support this ministry and help us continue to reach people all around the world click here: http://www.elevationchurch.org/giving/

Scripture References:

Isaiah 30, verses 19-21
